title: A Closer Look at Dangerholm’s Scott Solace Wasteland eRIDE Gravel Bike
content:
Dangerholm takes boutique to another level of beauty with his latest project; the Scott Solace Wasteland, complete with Klunker cross-bar, Mad Max inspired steel fork, and circular saws for disc rotors.

Read the full article at A Closer Look at Dangerholm’s Scott Solace Wasteland eRIDE Gravel Bike on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
